# The fileinfo extension

Configure the `fileinfo` extension.

This extension provides support for file content type and encoding.

## PHP_EXT_FILEINFO

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_FILEINFO_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
